body:
For a copy of my full resume, look [here](https://goo.gl/djaIY). 

Skills
-------------
* Concurrent Java Programming
* Amazon Web Services 
* Android programming
* Security

Projects
-------------
* [jPregel on AWS](https://charlesmunger.github.com/jpregel-aws/), an implementation of Googleâ€™s Pregel distributed graph processing engine on Amazon Web Services, designed for ease of use and trivial deployment - even for users with no systems background, or any familiarity with cloud services. 
* Touch to Text, a web-of-trust and public-key based chat system, that performs key exchange over NFC. The server runs as a TOR hidden service. Expected to be opened to the public sometime in November,
* [Friend App Matcher](https://github.com/charlesmunger/friend-app-matcher) Currently in a nascent state, this site+app will match your installed apps with those of your Facebook Friends.
name: Charles Munger
tagline: I am currently a graduate student at UCSB, working on a Masters in Computer Science.
